elevator.rmi
Class FloorButtonsImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
        |
        +--java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
              |
              +--java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
                    |
                    +--elevator.rmi.FloorButtonsImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FloorButtons, java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
public class FloorButtonsImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements FloorButtons

The class FloorButtonsImpl implements the elevator.rmi.FloorButtons interface. An object with the FloorButtonsImpl serves as a proxy for adding remote action listeners interested in receiving events from the floor buttons. A listener class must implement elevator.rmi.RemoteActionListener and, if possible, extend the java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject class or be exported by the static method java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject.exportObject(Object), as required by the Java RMI. The getFloorButtons() static method of the elevator.rmi.MakeAll class is invoked to get a remote reference to the FloorButtons object. A proxy object with the FloorButtonsImpl class is created for adding remote action listeners to the floor buttons. For example: 

 import java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject;
 import java.awt.event.*
 import elevator.rmi.*;
 ...
 public class MyListener extends UnicastRemoteObject
  implements RemoteActionListener {
     ...
     FloorButtons buttons = MakeAll.getFloorButtons();
     ...
     buttons.addActionListener((RemoteActionListener)this);
     ...
     public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event) {
      System.out.println(event.getActionCommand());
     }
     ...
 }

Version:
1.0
Author:
Vlad Vlassov, IMIT/KTH, Stockholm, Sweden
See Also:
FloorButtons, RemoteActionListener, ActionListener, ActionEvent, Serialized Form

                              int direction,
                              RemoteActionListener listener)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              IllegalParamException
Description copied from interface: FloorButtons
Adds a RemoteActionListener listener to a floor button of a specified direction.
Specified by:
addActionListener in interface FloorButtons
Following copied from interface: elevator.rmi.FloorButtons
Parameters:
floor - the number of the floor where the button is located.
direction - the direction (arrow up/down) of the button that is either FloorButtons.UP or FloorButtons.DOWN.
listener - the RemoteActionListener to be added
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if failed to execute
IllegalParamException - if the floor is not a legal floor number or the direction is not a legal button arrow direction,

addActionListener

public void addActionListener(int direction,
                              RemoteActionListener[] listener)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              IllegalParamException
Description copied from interface: FloorButtons
Adds RemoteActionListener listeners to up (down) buttons on all floors. An element of listener is added to either up or down buttons (if any) on a floor starting from bottom.
Specified by:
addActionListener in interface FloorButtons
Following copied from interface: elevator.rmi.FloorButtons
Parameters:
direction - the direction (arrow up/down) of the buttons that is either FloorButtons.UP or FloorButtons.DOWN.
listener - the array of RemoteActionListener to be added
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if failed to execute
IllegalParamException - if the length of listener does not match the number of floors or direction is not a legal arrow direction
